Title: Authorizes the New York state and local employees' retirement system to accept an application for disability retirement benefits from Andrew Reilly, Jr.
Summary: Authorizes the New York state and local employees' retirement system to accept an application for disability retirement benefits from Andrew Reilly, Jr.
ActClause: AN ACT in relation to authorizing the New York state and local employees' retirement system to accept an application for disability retirement benefits from Andrew Reilly, Jr.
